gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.7-041807-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: Requires launch option "PROTON_NO_D3D11=1 %command%" to run. Game works with similar performance as native and no glitches, but does not detect a Xbox One controller (don't know if it does on Windows either).
title: Clutch
